title: Islam on Campus - poll of 1400 uk students
description:
Islam on Campus is the most comprehensive survey ever undertaken of Muslim student 

opinion in the UK, based on a specially commissioned YouGov poll of 1400 students,

fieldwork and interviews. The report examines students&#039; attitudes on key issues 

including killing in the name of religion, establishing a worldwide Caliphate, 

introducing Sharia law to the UK, setting up an Islamic political party in the UK,

gender equality, the treatment of apostates and homosexuals and the compatibility 

of Islam with secularism and democracy.

pdf format

both the summary and the full version

visit http://www.socialcohesion.co.uk/ for more information


Please leave a comment if you want, this is just to show what is out there...

And before you go and spam, dl it watch it and make up your own mind...

cheers the_phyrexian
